programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: On a cold day, few dishes are as comforting as a hearty soup—unless it turns out starchy or gluey. Watch as we make thick and creamy versions of two of our favorites: ham and split pea, and rustic potato-leek.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Our goal was simple: Rescue two favorite fancy vegetable dishes—twice-baked potatoes and stuffed bell peppers—from the clutches of cafeterias, bad steakhouses, and frozen food manufacturers.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Bistro classics, such as steak au poivre and crème brûlée, offer a taste of real French cooking without pretension. We show you how to create these dishes without spending all day in the kitchen.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The test kitchen shows you how to make the perfect steakhouse dinner—salad with creamy blue cheese dressing and seared filet mignon.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We show you how to prepare fried rice and kung pao shrimp. Our findings of rice cookers and long-grain white rice guarantee perfect rice every time.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Simple yet interesting, both chicken Milanese and chicken piccata are reliable test kitchen favorites. We like to start them on the stovetop but finish the cooking in the oven

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The test kitchen provides foolproof recipes for two classic pasta sauces: puttanesca and Bolognese.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Pasta with garlic and oil is perhaps the most famous quick pasta dish. It starts with ingredients on hand—garlic, good olive oil, hot red pepper flakes—and turns them into something special and uncommonly good.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We uncover the secrets to beef Burgundy at its best—and also show you a way to make portions of it ahead of time.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We traveled to chili country, cooked with various experts in their kitchens, and tried out dozens of recipes in the test kitchen. We wanted a chili that would be hearty, heavy on the meat, and spicy but not overwhelmingly hot.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Macaroni and cheese and turkey Tetrazzini are two classic casseroles, but they are rarely as good as they could be. We knew we could do better—much better—in the test kitchen.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Pork chops are leaner than they used to be, which poses new problems for home cooks. We explain which chops to buy and how to cook them, ensuring perfectly cooked meat that is both crispy and juicy.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: On a hot summer's day, life doesn't get much better than a big, juicy, smoky slab of spicy, mouth-watering ribs. Our goal was to produce flavorful, juicy, tender ribs that would be well worth the time, money, and effort.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We were intrigued with the notion of barbecuing a whole side of salmon. Our goal was to have this large piece of fish spend enough time over the coals to pick up some real wood flavor.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We move the turkey out of the oven and onto the grill, freeing up precious cooking space for other Thanksgiving dishes and giving us a better tasting bird. We also perfect the flavor and texture of sweet potatoes and cranberry sauce.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Beef tenderloin can cost a small fortune, but it is one of the quickest and easiest large cuts to serve to a crowd. The key is to get good color development on the exterior without overcooking the interior.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Ham dinner—with green bean casserole—is classic American fare. But which kind of ham should you buy? And can you really make a "good" green bean casserole? We show you how.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Our sour cream coffee cake and light, flavorful fruit salads transform weekend brunch into an indulgent meal you'll want to make even when company isn't coming over. A few tips on great coffee round out the perfect start to a day.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The appeal of such quick bread as cinnamon buns and banana bread is clear. Supermarket cinnamon buns often have an odd, artificial flavor and sponge-like texture. And banana bread doesn't need to taste like over-the-hill bananas.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Real country bread, the kind made by an artisan and never found at the supermarket, is a thing of beauty. We wanted to develop a recipe that was every bit as good as the best country loaves but that was still doable for the cook who bakes in a home oven.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Thick, chewy chocolate cookies and spiced molasses cookies are classics. Watch as we discover which types of chocolate and molasses make these favorites great again.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Lemon meringue pie is a three-part recipe—crust, lemon filling, and meringue—and each one can be a challenge. We discover which rolling pins are best and whether you can use store-bought pie crust in a pinch. Then we perfect the filling and meringue.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: What could be more American than strawberry shortcake? But sometimes this classic summer fare can go terribly wrong. When it comes to cherry cobbler, sour cherries are a must. But where do you get sour cherries? Are jarred cherries a worthy alternative?

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Who can resist a chocolate cake? We wanted cakes that would be great tasting and easy to prepare, and we came up with two: old-fashioned, moist, and homey; the other elegant, dense, and ethereal.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: A true New York-style cheesecake should be pure and minimalist but also have just the right color, flavor, and density. With a crisp graham cracker crust and a filling that fades from creamy to cake-like, our cheesecake is worthy of any diner in New York.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Policía bueno, policía malo
programme.desc: Cuando el cadáver de un marine aparece al otro lado del mundo, la investigación obliga a Ziva a desenterrar un capítulo enterrado de su vida.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Código de conducta
programme.desc: Cuando un marine conocido por sus bromas pesadas es encontrado muerto en la víspera de Halloween, el equipo del NCIS descubre que las bromas "inocentes" de la víctima pueden haber inspirado una venganza macabra.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Fugitivos y consuelo
programme.desc: Una investigación de asesinato lleva a Gibbs y al equipo a hacer de consejero familiar de su antiguo mentor, Mike Franks, con la esperanza de evitar un sangriento conflicto internacional.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Fin del juego
programme.desc: Con la ayuda del equipo, Vance se enfrenta a sus demonios mientras descubre una compleja relación con un asesino que pone en peligro a toda su familia.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Los primeros 100 días
programme.desc: Frank y Garrett idean un plan para convencer al alcalde Chase de que colabore mejor con los demás para dirigir correctamente la ciudad.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): El palacio del enigma
programme.desc: Erin y Anthony deben confiar en un sociópata que afirma tener pruebas para condenar a un asesino. Además, Frank se enfrenta a la reacción de su departamento cuando suspende a un agente por comportamiento violento.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): A plena vista
programme.desc: Danny y Baez se enfrentan a la tarea de localizar a un traficante de drogas después de que dos jóvenes modelos aparezcan muertas por sobredosis. Además, Eddie y Jamie se unen para determinar quién es el autor intelectual de un robo.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Secretos de familia
programme.desc: Después de obtener una coincidencia de un pariente desconocido de una red de ADN, Sean Reagan investiga para averiguar quién podría ser esta persona misteriosa.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC se dirige a Wichita en busca de un sospechoso que secuestra niños mientras sus padres duermen. Además, Morgan está intentando averiguar quién fue el responsable del ataque.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando un sujeto ataca a la UAC, el equipo entra en acción para averiguar quién es el responsable.

programme.title: Mentes criminales

programme.title: Vampiros de coyoacan

programme.title: Traficantes de pánico

programme.title: Sin Rastro

programme.title: Caza Terrorista

programme.title: Escobar: La herencia maldita

programme.title: Escobar: La herencia maldita
programme.desc: Cuando el imperio Escobar se desmorona, la familia se vuelve una contra otra, mientras los carteles rivales exigen la muerte de Juan Pablo.

programme.title: Una niñera engañosa

programme.title: Salvador

programme.title: Pecado original

programme.title: Sophie's Choice

programme.title: De ratones y hombres

programme.title: La conquista del honor

programme.title: Robocop 2

programme.title: Ronin

programme.title: Caza Terrorista
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage enciende un barril de pólvora de acción mientras un veterano agente de la CIA va a la caza de su némesis, un terrorista mortal.

programme.title: El ilusionista

programme.title: Cantinflas

programme.title: The Crime of Father Amaro
programme.desc: Politics and sexual passions threaten to corrupt a young, newly-ordained priest in a small Mexican town.

programme.title: Amor, dolor & viceversa
programme.desc: Una película de crimen y suspenso sobre sueños inquietantes que se convierten en realidad para dos personas.

programme.title: Tormentero

programme.title: Leviatán, terror en la profundidad
programme.desc: En esta película de ciencia ficción, un equipo de exploración de aguas profundas descubre un barco de carga con un secreto mortal.

programme.title: Especies

programme.title: Especie mortal II
programme.desc: Un extraterrestre en forma de parásito se incuba en el cuerpo de un astronauta. Justin Lazard, Natasha Henstridge, Marg Helgenberger, Michael Madsen, Mykelti Williamson. Director: Peter Medak.

programme.title: Especies III
programme.desc: A medida que su especie se extingue por infecciones y enfermedades, una alienígena seductora inmunológicamente más fuerte se convierte en la única esperanza para que sigan viviendo.

programme.title: Especies: el despertar
programme.desc: Helena Mattsson y Ben Cross protagonizan esta aterradora continuación acerca de una sobrina y su tío que destapan la verdad de sus raíces alienígenas como consecuencia de una oleada de masacres. Dirigida por Nick Lyon.

programme.title: El Dorado
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum plays to perfection an alcoholic but gutsy sheriff who relentlessly battles the dark side of the wild West, ruthless cattle barons and crooked “businessmen.”

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: Lt. Col. Yorke leads his cavalry troops to the Rio Grande to fight a warring tribe. Yorke’s toughest battle lies ahead when his unorthodox plan to outwit the elusive Apaches leads to possible court-martial.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: The Misfits
programme.desc: In their final screen performances, Clark Gable and Marilyn Monroe are at their luminous best as an aging cowboy and a disillusioned divorcee, each trying to adapt to new ways of life in John Huston's piercing classic. Montgomery Clift also stars.

programme.title: Five Guns To Tombstone
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw is living a clean life until his no-good brother who just escaped from prison ropes him into pulling a robbery. Now Billy has his own plan...to prevent it. And all he needs is his six shooters and a little luck.

programme.title: The Big Country
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard (1950)
programme.desc: Intense, enthralling, and unforgettable, Sunset Boulevard stars Gloria Swanson as Norma Desmond, a faded silent-movie star, and William Holden as Joe Gillis, a down-on-his-luck screenwriter whom she enlists to help her make her triumphant return.

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair (1968)
programme.desc: Steve McQueen stars as a sophisticated but bored tycoon who pulls off a bank heist so stunning that even Boston's finest are baffled. Faye Dunaway is the sleek insurance investigator out to bring him in but who, ultimately, falls in love with him.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: Alfie is not really a bad sort. It’s just that he has this overwhelming desire for the opposite sex. You might say that “birds’ are irresistible to him, sort of second nature.

programme.title: Billion Dollar Brain
programme.desc: A billionaire, intent on destroying Communism by starting a world war, is close to achieving his goal with the help of the world's largest, and most powerful, computer. Secret Agent Harry Palmer (Michael Caine) is the only man who can stop him!

programme.title: Another Time, Another Place
programme.desc: Mark Trevor, a World War II newsman with the British Broadcasting Corporation who's torn between two women. One is Sara Scott, the American reporter working in England. The two embark on a romance – but it's an affair destined for tragedy.

programme.title: The Miracle Worker

programme.title: Judgment At Nuremberg

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: The Marine's favorite nightclub singer returns: Lou-Ann Poovie, who looks like a dream and sings like a nightmare. Sgt. Carter fights for her favors with two rivals -- Gomer and Duke.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: Gomer's love for Welsh rarebit causes him to sleepwalk -- and to tell off Carter.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: A club owner wants Gomer to sing every night.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: Carter volunteers Gomer for a parachute jump.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: The Third-Tuesday-of-Every-Month-Culture-Committee of the Every-Other-Wednesday-Afternoon-Discussion-Club decides that Hooterville needs some culture in the form of a symphony orchestra. And Lisa (Eva Gabor) may just know the perfect conductor.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Oliver's (Eddie Albert) nephew Charles (Don Edmonds) arrives for a visit, and Oliver is completely shaken up when the boy turns out to be a long-haired, motorcycle-ridin', hippy-dippy type. But, boy, does he know a thing or two about engines.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Oliver dreams of entering his crop in the Corn Festival, but the dreaded Bing Bug invades Hooterville's farms. After learning of his service as a WWII pilot, the locals volunteer him for the perilous task of flying the town's only crop duster.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: When a lovely, young and successful farmer comes to Oliver (Eddie Albert) for his legal counsel, Lisa (Eva Gabor) quickly becomes jealous of the two spending time together and becomes determined to break up what she sees as a budding romance.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: When the Monroe Brothers show up to fix the Douglas's closet, Lisa learns that Ralph is devastated because her true love has stood her up on another date. Lisa's solution: an intensive, two-day beauty treatment for Ralph…and the barn for Oliver!

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Oliver (Eddie Albert) takes to his soap box, delivering fiery, patriotic speeches after getting a bill from the State Farm Unattached Duty Tax for an outrageous $12.03! But no one can figure out why the tax is levied in the first place.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa (Eva Gabor) is curious to learn about the book that Oliver (Eddie Albert) is reading. It is the real-life story of pioneers Gus and Etta Thompson. The episode flashes back to the 19th century with Oliver appearing as Gus and Lisa as Etta.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Eb (Tom Lester) seeks dating advice from the Douglas's after laying eyes on former classmate Betty Jo Bradley from petticoat Junction. Oliver's well-intentioned guidance has mixed results when Eb hilariously misconstrues the advice he's given.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: The locals complain that Oliver's penchant for wearing business suits to do farm work is ruining Hooterville's image. Oliver tries to adjust, but the last laugh is on him when Lisa has her dressmaker design Italian him some swanky new overalls.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Edith finally confronts the waitress who tempted Archie's fidelity after Harry unwittingly hires her to work at Archie's Place.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: When Edith develops laryngitis on the eve of her singing debut at Stephanie's PTA recital, Archie steps in to understudy the duet.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Edith is arrested for passing phony $10 bills she got from Archie's Place.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: To be a DCC, you need to look like a DCC. This week Kelli makes sure all the girls have the look. The final rehearsal of the week brings emotions to the forefront as a girl gets sent home.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: As the candidates enter the sixth week of training camp they need to start looking like a DCC or their spot is in jeopardy. Melissa Rycroft and former DCC Tina Kalina sit in for Judy and give Kelli some fresh eyes.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: With three girls left to cut and the first game around the corner, the pressure is intense as the girls return to AT&T Stadium to take the field for the first time since auditions.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The final day of training camp has everyone nervous because Kelli and Judy might take a squad of less than 36.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: This season 400 hundred girls that have dared to dream they can become a world-famous Dallas Cowboys Cheerleader, put it all on the line, as preliminary auditions for the 2015-2016 season begin.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Talent and looks alone won't get you on the squad. Dreams are made and hopes are crushed as only 46 out of 59 candidates make it into Training Camp.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: As Training Camp starts Kelli lays down the law. Girls start to crack as the reality of how hard it is to become a DCC sets in. Melissa Rycroft offers hope and advice on how to make it through.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Kelli and Judy must cut 10 girls to get to the magic number of 36 for the squad. Uniform Fittings gives Kelli a better idea of who has the whole package. As the cuts begin so does emotional end of dreams.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: As the girls get the DCC look, it helps some and not others. Two surprise guests stop by rehearsal and rock the DCC's world. Kelli has one of the most awkward office visits of all time.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Cameos and Show Group auditions push the new girls and vets to their limits. Melissa Rycroft tries to save a DCC that's hanging by a thread and there is a shocking outcome from a Kelli office visit.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Emotions are supercharged as Kelli & Judy make a lot of tough cuts to keep up the quality of the team. Melissa Rycroft offers invaluable field experience.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Kelli finally announces the squad. Injuries threaten the opening of Cowboys training camp. Game Day chaos endangers a flawless performance.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Hundreds of beautiful and talented hopefuls arrive to try out for the best cheerleading team in the world, while many of the returning girls are looking for redemption. New judges increase the pressure of moving on to Finals.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Veterans fight for their jobs as new girls try to live their dreams and make DCC Training Camp. Standing in their way is; panel Interviews, solos, an exhausting dance combination and a room full of very tough judges.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The new candidates' eyes are opened as they get a taste of what it is to be a DCC. As girls struggle to learn the dances, the reality of being "Big Time", sets in. Melissa Rycroft meets the new girls for the first time.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: With the first cut looming, the girls must push their dance skills to the limit. Melissa Rycroft works to bring out showmanship. Extra stress is added on Makeover day as the girls try to get the DCC look.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: A new choreographer shakes things up. The girls better start looking good because uniform fittings and the Belk fashion show are on the agenda. Surprises continue when two-time Grammy winner Kacey Musgraves, stops by rehearsal.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Melissa Rycroft makes a house call to help Yuko. Kitty Carter rocks a few of the candidate's worlds. Cameos give Kelli & Judy a fresh perspective on the girls. At Show Group auditions, the girls let it all hang out.

programme.title: Dateline NBC

programme.title: Dateline NBC

programme.title: Ancient Worlds
programme.desc: Richard looks at the winners and losers of the great Bronze Age collapse, and the new powers that emerged in the harder-edged Age of Iron.

programme.title: Ancient Worlds
programme.desc: Richard Miles explores the power and the paradox of the `Greek Thing', a blossoming in art, philosophy and science that went hand-in-hand with political discord, social injustice and endless war.

programme.title: Ancient Worlds
programme.desc: In Richard Miles's epic story of civilisation, there have been plenty of examples of the great men of history, but none came close to the legend of Alexander of Macedon, known as `the Great'.

programme.title: Ancient Worlds
programme.desc: Archaeologist and historian Richard Miles examines the phenomenon of the Roman Republic, from its fratricidal mythical beginnings, with the legend of Romulus and Remus, to the all too real violence of its end.

programme.title: Ancient Worlds
programme.desc: The material benefits of the `good order' delivered by Roman rule provided its citizens and subjects with the security to ask profound questions about the meaning of life, questions that the Roman belief system was ill-equipped to answer.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Exploring a dinosaur graveyard in Patagonia to gain a better understanding of dinosaur evolution, particularly the Middle Jurassic period when they became gigantic.

programme.title: Archaeology: A Secret History
programme.desc: Archaeologist Richard Miles presents a series charting the history of the breakthroughs and watersheds in our long quest to understand our ancient past.

programme.title: Archaeology: A Secret History
programme.desc: Archaeologist Richard Miles shows how discoveries in the 18th and 19th centuries overturned ideas of when and where civilisation began, as empires competed to `own' the past.

programme.title: Archaeology: A Secret History
programme.desc: Richard Miles shows how 20th-century attention turned from civilisation and kings to the search for the common man against a background of science and competing political ideologies.

programme.title: Lost Cities of The Ancients
programme.desc: A journey to discover the legendary lost city of Piramesse, a magnificent ancient capital built 3,000 years ago by the Egyptian pharaoh Ramesses the Great.

programme.title: Lost Cities of The Ancients
programme.desc: In the Lambeyeque valley in northern Peru lies a strange lost world, the forgotten ruins of 250 mysterious pyramids, including some of the biggest on the planet, colossal structures made out of mud bricks.

programme.title: Lost Cities of The Ancients
programme.desc: It was one of the greatest vanishing acts in history. More than 3,000 years ago a mysterious and ruthless civilisation rose from nothing, created a brutal and unstoppable army and built an empire that rivalled Egypt and Babylon.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: It is only in recent years that experts have unearthed the biggest dinosaurs that ever lived. One monster eclipsed all others, more than seven times as heavy as diplodocus was the immense argentinosaurus.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: A new generation of carnivores was about to take killing to the next level. At the end of the Cretaceous period, these new hunter killers had spread throughout the globe.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.desc: What does it really take to become America's next drag superstar? From fabulous divas to outrageous flops, RuPaul gives a behind-the-scenes look at casting for Drag Race. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: RuPaul's Drag Race
programme.desc: Aren't the holidays such a drag? Brighten up your night with a fierce Christmas challenge on tonight's RuPaul's Drag Race. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: RuPaul's Drag Race
programme.desc: The queens face the final frontier as they shoot two out-of-this-world sci-fi movie trailers. RuPaul is joined by extra special guest judges the legendary Lily Tomlin and Caprica & Battlestar Gallactica's Allesandra Torressani. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: RuPaul's Drag Race
programme.desc: The girls get physical as they produce their own inspirational workout videos directed by fitness guru Susan Powter. RuPaul & Susan Powter are joined by extra special guest judge La Toya Jackson. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: RuPaul's Drag Race
programme.desc: The queens get a wake up call in the competition when they're asked to produce two morning news shows. RuPaul is joined by extra special guest judges Big Love's Chloë Sevigny and Debbie Matenoupolous. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: RuPaul's Drag Race
programme.desc: The queens compete in a star-studded TV game show where they must pull out their best celebrity impersonations. RuPaul is joined by extra special guest judges actress-comedienne Aisha Tyler & Amber Rose. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: The A-List: Dallas
programme.desc: The new A-List series hits the city of bulls, boots, and boys, boys, boys! In this premier episode, meet our wildly successful Texas A-Listers who are determined to wrangle anything their heart desires, even if it means stirring up a little drama.

programme.title: The A-List: Dallas
programme.desc: The drama is bigger in Texas! The southern boys get into even more trouble.

programme.title: The A-List: Dallas
programme.desc: Things get heated down South, as the A-Listers' true colors come out.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Scrappy threatens to abdicate the throne on the eve of Momma Dee's wedding. Kalenna and Tony meet with a therapist. Stevie takes the guys on a farewell fishing trip and discovers a secret about Joseline. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Momma Dee's wedding day arrives, but her children may not show. Margeaux reveals a secret to Nikko that turns his world upside down. Stevie makes a huge decision, while Joseline gives her big performance without her husband by her side. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Mimi's new relationship has everyone in Atlanta buzzing. Momma Dee snuffs out treason after Rasheeda and Kirk leave Scrappy high and dry. New on the scene, the King family has everyone on edge, as Tiara and Tommie compete to be Scrapp DeLeon's queen.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Chaos ensues between Tommie and Tiarra at Mimi's party. Tiarra confronts Scrapp with an ultimatum. Tammy discovers some surprising news about a new model that she wants to hire. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Tammy's luncheon with D.Smith and Betty turns left. Stevie J is back from his Hollywood adventures in LA. Waka Flocka returns to the ATL for an event. Scrapp sets up a meeting with Tiarra and Tommie.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Joseline returns to Atlanta with a vengeance. Scrappy and Rasheeda hash out their issues. Karlie lets it all hang out with Lyfe Jennings. K.Michelle pops up, and Scrapp DeLeon pops off at KK over her relationship with Tiarra. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Joseline dishes on Karlie Redd, Stevie J and KK. Kirk's daughter asks for help with her music career. Tommie's suspicions about Scrapp come to a fever pitch, and Mimi agonizes over Stevie J and Chris meeting for the first time. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: A surprise guest at Joseline's party leaves everyone at odds. Scrappy discovers Bambi's extracurricular activities. The King Family is divided over loss. Deb Antney makes Momma Dee and Shirleen squash their beef once and for all. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Karlie cozies up to a new man. Stevie J threatens to sever ties with Joseline and turns to an old friend for support. K.Michelle is back in town. Mimi and Chris hit a crossroad. Jessica Dime fans the flames between Bambi and Scrappy. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Scrapp DeLeon receives devastating legal news. K.Michelle's party brings her toe to toe with D. Smith and Betty Idol. Jessica Dime takes her relationship with Scrappy to the next level. Tiarra and KK try to find common ground. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Dime goes on a date with Scrappy but she's in for a surprise. Tommie discovers a hotel receipt in Scrapp's car with Karlie's name on it. Joseline turns to Mimi for help, and Mimi learns that Stevie is hiding secrets. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Deb's panel discussion on bullying has a surprising outcome. D. Smith helps Ariane find her voice. Scrapp has an emotional goodbye with his son, King, and spends his final night of freedom with his family. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Scrapp faces his sentencing as those that love him reflect on their future. Mimi and Stevie take a road trip to uncover the truth. Joseline makes a big confession. And D. Smith and Scrappy face-off after his insensitive social media post.

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Tammy faces the truth when Waka's indiscretions hit the blogs. While Joseline defends the legitimacy of her marriage, Stevie decides to work with one of her rivals. J-Nicks and Tiarra decide to take their relationship to the next level. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Shadowlands
programme.desc: Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions; the sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, where pups must battle the elements to survive.

programme.title: Coastal Africa
programme.desc: The struggle of the African Penguin, which lives in a hostile environment.

programme.title: Galapagos
programme.desc: Discover how scientists are working to restore and protect the Galapagos; witness penguin health checks, tortoise tagging and battles against invasive species, which are building a sustainable future for this delicate, one-of-a-kind ecosystem.

programme.title: Lionfish: The New Pirates of the Caribbean
programme.desc: Get closer to nature and deepen your understanding of our complex natural world. Filmed in the highest quality, Love Nature offers viewers powerful stories of nature's beauty and wonder from around the globe.

programme.title: Fur Seals: Battle for Survival
programme.desc: Engaging in a game of survival with two New Zealand fur seal pups.

programme.title: Islands: Nature's Wild Laboratories
programme.desc: Vancouver Island is the largest island on the west coast of North America; every inch of the island from its mountains to its forests is connected to the sea and every animal has to find a way to fit into that alliance to survive.

programme.title: Grey seals: a journey of survival
programme.desc: Uncover the new havens and habits of the rapidly dwindling grey seal population.

programme.title: Shark Squad
programme.desc: Sharks often get portrayed as mindless predators prone to attacking humans, but there is more to these graceful apex predators than meets the eye; the Bimini Sharklab undertakes novel research into shark intelligence.

programme.title: Alien Abyss
programme.desc: Exploring the bizarre mating rituals of the ocean's most peculiar creatures; learning how bloody battles for mates, gender bending, and super-size litters of babies might secure a next generation for these animals.

programme.title: Wild Wild East
programme.desc: The complicated relationships of crustaceans.

programme.title: Sky Safari
programme.desc: An aerial odyssey across Australia reveals a dramatic continent filled with unique creatures; featuring the iconic Uluru and Lake Eyre.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries
programme.desc: Kenya's growing human population means wildlife land is shrinking.

programme.title: Wild Korea
programme.desc: The notorious demilitarized zone of Korea exists on the boundary of two warring nations for nearly 70 years; however, amid the barbed wire fences and thousands of land mines, a unique natural wonderland coexists alongside the ashes of war.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Elands lock corkscrew horns; storks rattle sabre-shaped beaks; rhinos scare the competition with massive horns; striped marlins spear unsuspecting prey.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Madagascar is home to strange animals not found anywhere else on Earth; when these animals fight for supremacy, their battles are just as strange, from weird neck-wrestling weevils to ring tailed lemur moms that go into battle with baby on board.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A toothache prompts Jigen to rush to a clinic in a ruined town. The doctor, Livia, says she'll only take a look at him if he'll let her hold on to his gun, so he has no choice but to hand it over.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine is seen with the members of a failing circus troupe. A former member of the troupe, Tony Belacastro, known as the Magician, died ten years ago, but the secrets to his magic are written in his "Trick Recipes."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: The widow Elena is the only one who knows where her late husband hid his fortune. Zenigata shows up to protect her from Lupin's gang, who are out to steal it from her. Zenigata and Elena go to her mountain retreat to hide from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Nyx, Agent MI6 of the British Secret Service, values his wife and daughters above all others, so he keeps his identity as MI6 a secret from them. However, one of his daughters is kidnapped by some mysterious men.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: An eerie old castle converted to a hotel, known as the "The Mansion of the Cursed Bride," where the ghost of a bride is said to appear. It's said that a priceless treasure rests in the hotel, so Lupin and the gang pay a visit.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Long ago a dictator was assassinated, and the assassins involved were later killed one by one. Goemon was one of those involved in the assassination. A former bodyguard of the assassinated dictator, the legendary sniper Zora, might be out for revenge...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is invited by both Fujiko and Rebecca to a couples-only wine auction party. Both women have their sights on the same thing: The Lovesick Pig, a legendary wine appearing in the auction.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca is kidnapped and Lupin must rescue her! Before she was kidnapped, Rebecca had been deciphering a book left behind by a genius scientist, and MI6 made the mysterious comment that it was the "Dream of Italy."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin finally deciphers the book left behind by the genius scientist Uraga, and then mysteriously falls asleep. He ends up in a world where it's impossible to tell whether what he sees is a dream or reality. Is this the "Dream of Italy"?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has been arrested and imprisoned. He's tried everything he could to escape, but Zenigata stops him every time. Zenigata then sends Lupin to an even higher-security prison, just to be on the safe side. Has the end of Lupin III has come at last?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is so broke that he doesn't know what he'll eat tomorrow, so he concocts a plan to steal the Mona Lisa. But the Mona Lisa won't be easy to steal. He does his best to weave through the security net Zenigata has set.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Like a she-devil, the diamond "Cleopatra's Soul" is constantly changing owners. In search of the diamond, Lupin arrives at what appears to be an ordinary school...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen, and Goemon decide to go eat some tasty sushi, but when they hop in the car to leave, they find a dog inside. Lupin promises to drop the dog off with Fujiko while they're out getting sushi.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Greco is a man revered as a savior for defeating evildoers one after another. Everyone Greco targets die within 24 hours, killing and being killed by their own comrades. When provoked by Greco, Lupin and the gang head to Greco's church.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A mysterious portrait of Lupin appears at a major fashion show in Milan. When it's determined that the portraits have been painted by Leonardo Da Vinci, Lupin realizes something and rushes to the church where "The Last Supper" is displayed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While shopping with his family, Nyx is shot by someone and loses consciousness. He wakes up bound, and before he is Percival, his boss from his days as MI6.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the car that the famous singer Nora Anita loved and drove for nearly half a century. Zenigata and the police are after him, but they won't make a move for fear of damaging the priceless car. Where is Lupin headed in the treasured car?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While in Italy, Lupin gets a call from someone claiming to have kidnapped Fujiko. The kidnapper blackmails Lupin into stealing a marionette once owned by Gennai Hiraga and now being kept in a mansion in Tokyo.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Declarations of theft show up throughout the city, and they all bear the message "Tonight I'm going to get you, Lupin III," with a lipstick mark underneath. The one who's been distributing the notes is Rebecca.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Da Vinci announces that he is going to unveil his latest work in San Marino. Its title is "World Harmony." After the announcement, for some reason, people all around the Italian Peninsula fall unconscious... and Lupin and the gang are no exception.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca's personality is under Da Vinci's control. In an effort to save her, Lupin delves into her mind, where he struggles with all kinds of traps set by Da Vinci. He manages to find Rebecca's memories, but Da Vinci has overwritten all her memories.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin meets Rebecca to sign divorce papers, before they could finish they are attacked by zombies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca remembers the first time she meets Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #13: Alcatraz Connection
programme.desc: Master thief Lupin III, gunslinger Jigen and swordmaster Goemon are back for a new caper, this time aboard the casino-ship Machine Gun Kelly. Between the mafia, interpol, and a secret organization based under Alcatraz!

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: Tito se tropieza con los perros Groseros en la calle cantando Doo Wop. Los reúne con Perro y Gato y forman un grupo de canto para convertirse en súper estrellas. / Lola Caricola tiene que hacer un documental sobre Gato y Perro.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: Nearburg se convierte en tierra invernal y Perro y Gato, Lola, Dunglap, Mervis y los perros Grasosos aprovechan la oportunidad para pasear en trineo por la nieve. / Perro obtiene un equipo de hipnosis de juguete.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: Perro construye su propio Camión de Monstruos y arrastra a Gato hasta la plaza de Nearburg para participar del Rally de camiones de monstruos. / Lola convence a Perro y Gato de producir miel en el jardín.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: Perro y Gato pelean durante el almuerzo y continúan en la cocina, tiran harina, azúcar, chocolate y frutas por todo el lugar. / Perro y Gato heredan algunas tierras en la costa del hermoso lago Wanamaker, empacan sus cosas y se van.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: Perro y Gato se transportan al año 3001 para luchar contra el malvado Gran Tito. / Lola vence a Gato por primera vez en la Convención de Inventos de Nearburg y lo que convierte a Gato en un enemigo envidioso.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: Walt, el pavo del desfile de Acción de Gracias, aparece en la casa de Perro y Gato buscando refugio. Perro lo hace entrar y el hambriento Gato lo quiere devorar.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: Es la noche de Halloween y Gato, se disfraza como Duque Kahanamoku de Hawai y Perro, se disfraza como Conde Perrdrácula, salen en busca de dulces. Un vampiro peruano, Nosferacho, muerde a Perro y lo convierte en vampiro.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: Perro está entusiasmado porque hoy es el Día de Bromas Raras, la versión del Día de los Inocentes. / Perro y Gato se preparan para volver al reencuentro de la vieja escuela, en donde Gato quiere reavivar su romance con Sally.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: Es el Día Anual de los Padres y, como siempre, Gato y Perro quedan excluidos porque no tienen padres. Perro espera que este año sus padres finalmente aparezcan. Gato insiste en que la búsqueda es en vano.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: La nave espacial en la que estaban Perro y Gato cae en un lago congelado donde un monstro del lago termina comiéndoselos como a un bocadillo.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: Una vez en el pueblo de Perros y Gatos, CatDog logran que todos los perros y gatos de la ciudad se enfrenten los unos a otros. Comienza una batalla en la cual Perro y Gato intentan interferir pero nada sale como lo esperaban.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: Hace un año desde que el álter ego del súper héroe Perro el Poderoso salvó al Alcalde Rancio el Conejo de la Parca y ahora Nearburg está celebrando. / Los sobrinos de Tito vienen de visita.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: Perro y Gato están en la Convención de Fanáticos de Mean Bob, mirando una lucha de WWF entre Mean Bob y su enemigo Evil Eric. / Tito sale a caminar, y Gato y Perro aprovechan para entrar a su casa.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: Este es el cuento de un viejo pescador sobre el pez espada que cuelga de la pared del living de Perro y Gato. / Gato sufre una crisis de identidad cuando una banda de gatos bohemios abre una tienda cerca de la casa de Perro y Gato.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: Desde que era un cachorro, Perro siempre persiguió al camión de la basura, conocido como el viejo 159. / Perro tiene que ponerse un cono sobre su cabeza para protegerse de las picaduras de garrapatas en la oreja.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: La rivalidad entre hermanos se descontrola cuando Papá y Mamá vienen a visitar a Perro y Gato. / Perro realmente tiene un problema cuando descubre que su fuente de alimentación preferida proviene de animales.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: Es el día de recoger la basura y Perro no resiste su instinto natural de correr detrás del camión. / Perro quiere ir a Taco Depot, pero lo tienen prohibido.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: Perro corre a la playa y termina contrayendo pulgas. La cura es usar una correa correctiva pero Gato se rehúsa. / Perro se come toda la comida de Gato en un grupo de enfoque de comida, llevando a la creación de comida para Catdog.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: Es noche de luna llena y los instintos de Perro están sumamente disparados por lo que intenta resistir la tentación de correr con el grupo salvaje. / Gato comienza a etiquetar sus pertenencias para evitar que Perro las destruya.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Después de escuchar una historia del Abuelo, Tommy sueña con que los extraterrestres lo llevan adentro de una nave espacial. / Cuando el Abuelo pierde a Tommy, decide usar sus técnicas de investigador de los años 30’s para encontrarlo.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Cuando un juego de escondidas se pone extraño, Carlitos pierde sus lentes y el mundo le parece como una pesadilla borrosa. / Un zorrillo moja a Carlitos y él se pone más triste que nunca.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Cuando a Tommy le sacan su osito preferido, decide tomar el consejo de Angélica y empieza a portarse mal. / Angélica recibe un juego de magia como regalo. Ella y los Rugrats se sorprenden cuando Angélica hace desaparecer a Lili.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Una nueva familia se muda en frente de la casa de Tommy y él inmediatamente se hace amigo de su nueva vecina de tres años, Susie. / Hugo le compra a Tommy un juego para armar, pero los bebés se entretienen más con la caja del juguete.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Después de que Angélica les cuenta una historia de terror, Tommy y Carlitos comienzan a tener miedo de irse por el desagüe de la bañera. / Cuando el hermano de Didi se casa, Tommy y Carlitos se obsesionan con el pastel.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Tommy y Carlitos pierden sin querer a Cynthia, la muñeca favorita de Angélica y tienen que decidir si contárselo o no a Angélica. / Carlitos tiene un amigo imaginario que se llama Barney, que nadie puede ver o escuchar, solamente Carlos.

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales
programme.desc: Los Rugrats piensan que un camión de basura que pasa todas las semanas es un monstruo que se llama Hubert. / Los Rugrats ven un programa de televisión sobre un perro que habla, y se convencen de que Firulais los está rechazando.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The staff and patrons of the Baratie panic when Don Krieg arrives! The starving pirate begs for nourishment, only to find himself denied. Unable to see a wretch starve, Sanji steps in once again.

programme.desc: Don Krieg promises further malice as he returns to his ship, but the threat to the Baratie proves short-lived as an even bigger threat arrives!

programme.desc: The Going Merry’s been stolen by Nami, and the showdown for possession of the Baratie is delayed. But the action’s not dead in the water – Zoro challenges Hawk-Eye Mihawk to a duel!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The battle begins for possession of the Baratie, with Zeff leading the cooks against Krieg’s pirates. Luffy and crew join the fray, but things aren’t looking too good!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Sanji recalls his childhood as an apprentice chef aboard a ship attacked by Red Foot Zeff! When the young Sanji found himself overboard, it was the fearsome captain himself who jumped to the rescue.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As the battle for Baratie rages on, Luffy is forced to take a drastic course of action, and Ghin debates where his loyalties lie.

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.desc: Nami’s adopted sister, Nojiko arrives to fill in some details about the skilled mapmaker’s younger days.

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami must decide between letting Arlong maintain his hold over her, or joining the Straw Hats and leading the oppressed villagers against the tyrant Fishman.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Arlong better watch his back-fins, because Captain Luffy knows about all the horrible things he did to Nami – and it makes his blood boil.

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After a grueling fight, Luffy defeats Arlong and succeeds in destroying his headquarters. The merry marauders enjoy the fruits of victory while Nami makes peace with her turbulent past.

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: RiffTrax Shorts: Harry the Dirty Dog

programme.title: RiffTrax Shorts: People Soup

programme.title: RiffTrax Short: How Much Affection?

programme.desc: This feature is a parody. It contains the original movie combined with comedic commentary by Mary Jo and Bridget from RiffTrax.

programme.desc: Still bound together by the Jaffa bracelets, Daniel Jackson and Vala are transported to a galaxy populated by worshippers of a potentially threatening authority called the Ori. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: Daniel and Vala learn that their reactivation of an ancient communications device has inadvertently exposed Earth to the wrath of the group of unforgiving deities called Ori. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: Daniel Jackson and Vala embark on a series of dangerous missions in their quest to unlock the frustrating Jaffa bracelets that seems to have bound them together for eternity. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: When Daniel and Vala attempt to undo the teachings of the Ori on a distant planet, they and the planet's inhabitants find themselves subject to their foe's vengeful wrath. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: The brilliant astrophysicist and former member Samantha Carter returns to SG-1 to join the team on a mission to free a distant planet called Kallana from the Ori's control. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: A drive malfunction aboard a mysterious duplicate Daedalus sends the team jumping through various alternate realities where they encounter sinister alien life forms, a searing sun, and a pitched space battle over Atlantis.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: After a series of anomalies and power disruptions, the Atlantis team is faced with an impossible decision: to create the means to release an mysterious entity or stand by as it systematically destroys the city’s technological infrastructure.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: On a flight back to Atlantis, McKay inexplicably falls ill. Fearing the worst, the doctor summons McKay’s sister to say her goodbyes. But Ronan tells Jeannie of a shrine that would grant Rodney one day to be himself again, before he dies.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: Dr. Beckett (Paul McGillion) is asked to delay his departure from Atlantis when word comes that Major Anne Teldy (Christina Cox) and her away team have stumbled onto one of Michael’s abandoned labs inside an extensive underground catacomb.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: Keller and the Atlantis team meet with the Wraith, Todd, to deliver a startling proposition. Keller believes she has found a cure for the Wraiths of their need to feed on humans but requires a test subject for this breakthrough treatment.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: McKay and Ronan volunteer to assist Dr. Jennifer Keller with a medical follow-up away from Atlantis. Later, when the pair return to her, they are surprised to learn that she left earlier but a search of the village turns up no sign of her.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1’s Dr. Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) travels to Atlantis when his research suggests that a rebellious Ancient scientist named Janus (Gildart Jackson) may have hidden a secret lab somewhere within the city.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: Jackson and McKay have reactivated the Attero device, an ancient machine designed to annihilate the Wraith. In doing so, they discover the reason the device was ultimately abandoned… Meanwhile, Todd continues to hold the Daedalus crew captive.

programme.title: Los herederos del monte

programme.title: Los herederos del monte

programme.title: Los herederos del monte

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez visit Mayor Henson to complain that their property tax is ridiculously low. After the Mayor proves his incompetence by offering a refund, Gomez is persuaded to become a candidate for the office.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: During a welcome home party for Cousin Itt, Morticia notices that the diminutive guest of honor seems to be losing his hair. Uncle Fester experiments with his chemistry set to produce a concoction that grows hair and tries the remedy on Itt.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley return in tears from trick-or-treating because a neighbor has told them there is no such thing as a witch. Morticia and Gomez plan to prove to the children that they do exist--by summoning a witch to a séance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Determined to correct the dreadful literature that Wednesday and Pugsley are exposed to, Morticia sets out to create a new literary world. Gomez fears that his wife's first manuscript is so good, that once the publisher reads it he will lose her.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: In need of artistic fulfillment, Morticia takes up sculpting. An art critic views her first endeavor--a three-eyed Gomez statue--and clubs it with his cane. Gomez, who won't have Morticia's heart broken gets a seedy art dealer to buy it.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley copies one of his dad's old love letters and sends it to his teacher. Miss Dunbar comes to visit the Addams home and confesses to Gomez that no man has ever fallen so in love with her, leading Morticia to pretend to be the jealous wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Wednesday befriends a new boy her age, Robespierre Courtney, Morticia invites his parents, Mr. and Mrs. Henry Courtney to visit the Addams house for tea. Unbeknownst to them, the Courtney's are hoping to meet a number of the social set.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: There is a neighborhood burglar on the loose, and Morticia has reason to believe it could be Gomez. Morticia decides to probe his subconscious mind for a key to his criminality after she and Uncle Fester discover loot hidden in the storeroom.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's pet plant Cleopatra gobbles up her favorite photo of Gomez from the family album. When the original photographer is found and asked to make a duplicate picture, it is discovered that he is now with the Department of Motor Vehicles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez plays host to Don Xavier Molines, a family friend during his childhood in Spain, and his daughter Consuella. Morticia's hospitality is put to the test when Consuella reveals that she has been promised in marriage to Gomez since childhood.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Wednesday's and Pugsley's faith in Santa Claus is shaken, Uncle Fester is chosen to back up Santa in case the real St. Nick is too busy to come. However, Fester-Santa gets stuck in the chimney, so each of the other adults fills in for him.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Fester is so smitten upon receipt of a photo of his love, a bearded carnival lady, that he borrows stamp money to mail her a proposal. Morticia dons a beard and poses as the mother to convince Fester that he will have to work to support a wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Because she thinks Fester (Jackie Coogan) and Grandmama (Blossom Rock) are spoiling the children, Morticia (Carolyn Jones) hires a governess. Insulted, Fester paints a white line down the center of the Addams house, dividing it in half.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez see Fester conferring with TV muscleman Jack LaGrann (Jack LaLanne), and think that Fester is planning a television career. However, Uncle Fester confides to Lurch that he has to go on a secret diet and exercise.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez find Grandfather Pegleg's treasure map and summon Captain Grimby. They hope to charter his boat for the treasure hunt. But after meeting the Captain, Morticia is careful to keep the nature of the mission secret.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia Frump is madly in love with Horatio Bartholomew, the man who has everything, except the truth about her relatives. Morticia, not convinced by Bartholomew, persuades playboy Cousin Itt to stir the embers of his past romance with Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley shocks his parents when he gives up his new atomic reactor as kid stuff and announces that he wants to find his own job. His first try is as a medical assistant to Dr. Bird. He turns up, scalpel in hand, ready to help during an operation.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandma Frump (guest star Margaret Hamilton), comes to the mistaken conclusion that her daughter, Morticia (Carolyn Jones), and Gomez (John Astin) plan to pack her off to an old folks home. Actually, they plan to send her to a beauty farm.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia, in order to be part of the National Beautification Program, decides to become a home decorator and offers her services to the neighbors. Next door neighbor, and insurance agent, Joe Digby hires Morticia in hopes of selling them insurance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia taunts Uncle Fester into announcing that he is going to join the Peace Corps. Fester feels he's a cinch to be accepted because Gomez plans to pull strings in Washington on his behalf. The entire family agrees to help him study for the exam.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Allyn Joslyn guest-stars as Sam Hilliard, a former truant officer who now heads a private school where Wednesday and Pugsley are enrolled. When Hilliard breaks under the strain of dealing with the Addams children, Gomez buys the school.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Dr. Marvin P. Gunderson is summoned to examine Kitty Kat, the ailing lion pet of the Addams Family. Morticia decides that it is the doctor who needs help. To build his confidence, human members of the family pretend to be ill so he can effect cures.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's concern that Lurch is overworked leads Gomez to the operating table to assemble a custom-built secondary butler. Lurch lets the robot do all the work and then begins to feel that he isn't needed anymore.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Uncle Fester incinerates the family's stuffed bear with his flamethrower, Morticia reports the accident to the insurance company. Mr. Henson the head of the company, sends his assistant, Mr. Digby, to handle the case.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch suffers from unrequited love over Tiny Trivia (guest star Diane Jergens), Morticia's visiting school chum who only has eyes for show business. The entire family decides to try to turn their stolid butler into a new personality.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Ophelia laments that she has been jilted, Morticia suggests a career as an alternative to marriage. She tries chemistry first (with explosive results) then turns to operatic singing. Cousin Itt is summoned to coach her to stardom.

programme.title: Halloween With The New Addams Family
programme.desc: America's first family of ghastly giddiness reunites for a Halloween celebration that will raise the…dead! John Astin, Carolyn Jones, Ted Cassidy, Jackie Coogan, Lisa Loring and Ken Weatherwax all reprise their roles from the hit original series!

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Will one team's chance at a FAST FORWARD be left blowing in the wind?

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams test their attention to detail in a round of speed dating.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: This season's racers are introduced and for the first time in the history of The Amazing Race, the team to finish in first place will be awarded a surprise, game-changing advantage.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams begin their adventure from Times Square in New York City, where host Phil Keoghan introduces a new game-changing element, "The Save."

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The Race continues through London, England, where the Express Pass is on the line, but several teams' hopes of a first-place finish are capsized while boating in a punt in Oxford.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The Race makes its first-ever visit to the Shetland Islands in Scotland, where teams must corral an unruly flock of sheep down a winding obstacle course.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: When tasked with a painstaking Detour, the Dentists face the realization that they may need to use "The Save." Meanwhile, one team's lack of communication leads to a massive meltdown on the mat.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: With a double U-turn looming, emotions run high when two teams accuse each other of playing dirty.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Racers struggle on a frightening Road Block when they're suspended high above the Atlas Mountains.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: THE AMAZING RACE takes off on its milestone 300th leg as teams race through Palermo, Sicily. Two rival teams form unlikely alliances and Racers battle to beat the clock in a high-octane go-cart race through the mountains.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: For the first time in series history, the show travels to Valletta, Malta, where teams are thrown off balance when challenged to serve drinks to the knights of Malta. Also, a blind detour leaves Racers on a slippery slope.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: One dangerous misstep leaves a Racer dangling 600 feet high in the Singapore sky, while a traditional Asian detox leaves several Teams writhing in pain.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams race to Manila, Philippines where they get muddy with an ornery Ox during a memorable switchback challenge from season five.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: On the penultimate leg of the Race, two strong teams make a potentially one-million-dollar mistake. Also, Phil Keoghan greets the teams with shocking news at the Pit Stop.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Profiles the work of world-renowned forensic experts and the procedures they use to solve murders and other mysteries in minutes or centuries after they happen.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Weeks pass as forensic investigators search for even the smallest clues, only to find what they feared in their own backyard. In Canada, two people die suddenly of unknown causes, and their deaths may not be as coincidental as they first appear.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When abduction turns to murder, forensic science is the only key to finding justice for the victims of a kidnapper's deadly intentions.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Anytime, anywhere, people disappear – kidnapped from their daily routines. Predators always leave clues behind, but chasing them takes time, hampering investigators' attempts to solve these fatal abductions.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Every family has its secrets, and sometimes blood relations lead to bloodshed. When murder becomes a family affair, investigators must turn to forensics to uncover family plots.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensic scientists find clues written in blood as they investigate the deaths of three women killed by the men who once loved them.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Approximately 1.8 million Americans are reported missing each year. Some are runaways who find their way home, but others simply disappear. When foul play is suspected, investigators turn to forensics to find the missing.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In Northern California, a fire rages in the middle of the night. A woman's charred body is discovered in the smoldering aftermath.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: There's never a good reason for murder, but some killers are particularly brutal—choosing their prey at random or with no apparent motive and then cunningly covering their tracks. Even so, telltale clues remain.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Sometimes the scales of justice are balanced by just a few milligrams of evidence – a couple of fibers, a tooth filling, or a smudge on a piece of tape. The biggest cases are often solved by the smallest clues.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Solving crimes may begin with gut intuition, but advanced science provides investigators with irrefutable proof. When criminals go to great lengths to mask their crimes, Investigators must step up the challenge and remain forever …undaunted.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In North Carolina, the home of a prominent couple becomes an unlikely scene of terrible bloodshed. Across the country, a California woman vanishes, worrying her family and the investigators trying to find her.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Stolen Youths
programme.desc: A young girl playing in her yard in Spokane, Washington suddenly vanishes. In St. Louis another girl leaves to visit a friend. She never arrives.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: What does it take to prove murder if the victim cannot be found? Investigators must go to extreme lengths to catch the killer when the victim is presumed dead.

programme.title: Teofimo Lopez vs Vasiliy Lomachenko
programme.desc: On October 17th, 2020 Teofimo Lopez and Vasiliy Lomachenko battled for IBF, WBA and WBO World Lightweight title in The Bubble at MGM Grand in Las Vegas in a 12 round bout that ended in victory for Lopez.

programme.title: Timothy Bradley Jr vs Ruslan Provodnikov
programme.desc: On March 16th, 2013, Timothy Bradley fought Ruslan Provodnikov for the WBO Welterweight Title in Carson, California. Provodnikov put up a very strong challenge in an incredible fight, but Bradley prevailed, earning a unanimous decision victory.

programme.title: Todd Foster vs Jeff Mayweather
programme.desc: On August 6th, 1992 Todd Foster fought Jeff Mayweather at Denton Field in Miles City with Mayweather going down in rounds 7 & 8 the bout resulted in a technical knockout victory for Foster.

programme.title: Tyson Fury vs Deontay Wilder 3
programme.desc: On October 9th, 2021, Tyson Fury fought Deontay Wilder in their third and final matchup against each other at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas. In a thrilling fight, Fury once again proved his dominance, defeating Wilder by an 11th-round TKO.

programme.title: Tyson Fury vs Dillian Whyte
programme.desc: On April 23rd, 2022 Tyson Fury fought Dillian Whyte for the WBC World Heavyweight title at Wembley Stadium Whyte suffered injuries throughout the fight causing the fight to end by technical knockout in the 4th round giving the bout to Fury.

programme.title: Tyson Fury vs Tom Schwarz
programme.desc: On June 15th, 2019 Tyson Fury went up against Tom Schwarz for the WBO Intercontinental Heavyweight title at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas in a bout that lasted two rounds ending by technical knockout securing Fury's win.

programme.title: Vasiliy Lomachenko vs Jorge Linares
programme.desc: On May 12th, 2018, Vasiliy Lomachenko fought Jorge Linares for the WBA and Ring Magazine Lightweight Titles at Madison Square Garden in New York. Despite being knocked down in round six, Loma was able to stop Linares in the 10th round.

programme.title: Vinny Pazienza vs Roberto Duran 2
programme.desc: On January 14th, 1995 Vinny Pazienza fought Roberto Duran for a second time at the Convention Hall in Atlantic City in a 12 round bout resulting in a win for Pazienza.

programme.title: Alexis Arguello vs Alfredo Escalera
programme.desc: On January 28th, 1978 Alexis Arguello fought Alfredo Escalera for the WBC World super featherweight title that ended in the 13th round.

programme.title: Bernard Hopkins vs Kelly Pavlik
programme.desc: On October 18th, 2008 Bernard Hopkins fought Kelly Pavlik at the Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City ending in a unanimous decision victory for Hopkins.

programme.title: Bernard Hopkins vs Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: On September 18th, 2004, Bernard Hopkins fought Oscar De La Hoya for the undisputed world middleweight title at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas. After a quiet first eight rounds, Hopkins finished De La Hoya with a brutal body shot in the ninth round.

programme.title: Brandon Rios vs Miguel Acosta
programme.desc: On February 26th, 2011, Brandon Rios fought Miguel Acosta for the WBA World Lightweight Title at the Palms in Las Vegas. In a great back-and-forth fight, Brandon Rios knocked down Acosta hard, stopping him in the 10th round.

programme.title: Brandon Rios vs Mike Alvarado 1
programme.desc: On October 13th, 2012, Brandon Rios fought Mike Alvarado for the WBO Latino Super Lightweight Title in Carson, California. Showing his quickness and agility, Rios put on a show with a 7th round TKO victory.

programme.title: Chris Eubank vs Nigel Benn 1
programme.desc: On November 18th, 1990, Chris Eubank fought Nigel Benn for the WBO Middleweight Title at the Resorts World Arena in Birmingham, UK. Eubank's constant pressure on Benn and powerful punching led him to stop Benn in the ninth round.

programme.title: Diego Corrales vs Jose Luis Castillo
programme.desc: On May 7th, 2005 Diego Corrales faced Jose Luis Castillo for WBC and WBO World Lightweight titles at the Mandalay Bay Resort in Las Vegas in a bout that went 10 rounds that ended in technical knockout giving the win to Corrales.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Fab Four is fabber than ever, with the addition of Holly Swag. Holly's determined to put her best foot forward with her new crew in her first match in the Foursome against Ashley Blaze. Valentina Diamante debuts for WOW against Coach Campanelli.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It's finally time for Samantha Smart and The Classmaster to collect on the deal they made with Matchmaker David McLane for the main event with a WOW World Championship match against The Beast.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The WOW roster is reeling from last week's news and the videotape delivered from The Beast when Matchmaker David McLane announces a 12-Woman Battle Royale to crown a new champion.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: New tag team champions Big Rig Betty and Jessie Jones celebrate their title reign to kick off an episode full of qualifying matches for the upcoming over-the-top-rope Battle Royal for the WOW World Championship.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The WOW Battle Royal for the World Championship approaches as the Superheroes continue to vie to qualify, including Genesis, who faces new Superhero Ashley Blaze. Meanwhile, Xena Phoenix looks forward to continuing her strong start in WOW.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Backed by Alliance members Adriana Gambino, BK Rhythm and Gigi Gianni, Reina Del Rey is on a mission to expand the Alliance's hold over WOW with a victory over Foxxy Fierce - and she's vowed to take no prisoners on the roster.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: On the heels of their victory last week, Miami Sweet Heat demands a rematch for the WOW Tag Team Championships as other Superheroes continue to focus on qualifying for the upcoming Battle Royal.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After Miami Sweet Heat's Lindsey and Laurie Carlson and Animal Instinct's Goldie Collins and Katarina Jinx both called "next" on the WOW Tag Team Championships last week, the main event sees a triple confrontation with both teams.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The qualifying matches are over, and twelve competitors are finally ready to compete in the over-the-top-rope Battle Royal for the WOW World Championship vacated by The Beast. Who will be the last woman standing and NEW WOW World Champion?

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It's the beginning of a new reign in WOW as new WOW World Champion The Classmaster, accompanied by the IQ Superior Samantha Smart, celebrates The Classmaster victory in last week's Championship Battle Royal.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: All eyes - and one team's mouths - are on the main event - as a Dog Food Match between Animal Instinct and Big Rig Betty and Jessie Jones takes place. The loser will be forced to eat dog food!

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Las Vegas VIP Abilene Maverick wants one thing and one thing only - and it's the WOW World Championship for her bestie, reality TV star Paola Mayfield! And, in the Main Event, The Classmaster defends her WOW World Championship for the first time.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Genesis remains in the championship title hunt and her challenge could be the toughest of all when she battles the Albanian Grappler, Xena Phoenix. In the Main Event, Miami's Sweet Heat, Lindsey and Laurie Carlson continue to seek to up their win record.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Mad angry from the outcome of the dog food match, Big Rig Betty and Jessie Jones look to get even with Animal Instinct, with a stipulation that Goldie Collins and Katarina Jinx can't weasel out of - a No DQ, Dog Collar match in the main event!
