programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After discovering the location of Dartz's secret base, our heroes are on their way to stop Dartz once and for all. Can they reach Dartz before he resurrects the lethal Grand Dragon Leviathan from its millennial slumber?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz's secrets are finally revealed! As the answers to the most puzzling questions are exposed, the Pharaoh and Kaiba realize how much is at stake.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz plants the souls of our captured heroes into Mirror Knights to use them as puppets to fight the Pharaoh and Kaiba.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz summons the thundering Orichalcos Shunoros to pound the Pharaoh and Kaiba into pancakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's soul has been captured, leaving the Pharaoh all alone to fend for himself against the invincible forces of Dartz and the Orichalcos! Will his friends reach out from the beyond to give him one last fighting chance?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gateway opens for the final endgame as the world-devourer Grand Dragon Leviathan and the legendary Atlantis rise out of its watery grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: All the monsters of Earth join forces with the survivors of the monster domain for an epic showdown against Grand Dragon Leviathan!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grand Dragon Leviathan's thunderous roars unleash hundred-foot tall waves worldwide! How can Yugi stop the annihilation of the planet?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang have saved the world from Dartz and his Grand Dragon Leviathan, but they're about to face their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is trapped inside the Duel Dome, and the only way to escape is by defeating the Duel Computer, programmed with the skills of the world's top duelists. Since the Duel Computer has access to thousands of cards, how can Yugi win?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the start of the KC Grand Championship! Sixteen of the world's greatest duelists vie for a chance to challenge Yugi as the King of Games!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: How does Apdnarg Otum know all of Joey's strategies? How can Joey stop Apdnarg when he gathers his ancient cards to unleash the fiercest monster from the great past? But the biggest mystery... how can Joey not know who Apdnarg Otum is?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the second match of the KC Grand Championship as Rebecca faces the kung-fu kicking Asia champion Vivian Wong. However, there's more at stake than just winning the duel - Yugi's heart is on the line, whether he likes it or not.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first round is over, leaving eight duelists to compete for the right to face Yugi for the KC Grand Championship. Unfortunately for Joey, his next opponent is Zigfried Lloyd, who defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor in one turn.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zigfried activates Ride of the Valkyries, the same card that defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor at the same time.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the semifinals of the KC Grand Championship, it's a duel between child prodigies as Rebecca faces Leon Wilson and his fairy tale faction.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi finds Grandpa's kidnapper, but is it really a kidnapping? While Yugi unravels the truth, Rebecca starts to unravel when her dragons fall prey to Leon's fervent fables. Rebecca must think of a new plan quickly or there will be no happy ending.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Zigfried vs. Leon for the right to challenge Yugi in the KC Grand Championship Finals... but Kaiba stops the duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a battle between Zigfried and Kaiba. Zigfried quickly gains the advantage by destroying Kaiba's monsters before he can even draw them!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Yugi vs. Leon for the title of King of Games at the KC Grand Championship! Something sinister lurks in the shadows, for this duel is more than just getting the crown. Zigfried's greatest revenge will commence as his real plan is unleashed.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Leon is Zigfried's younger brother, and he'll avenge his family's loss. Leon's fairy tales are giving Yugi nightmares but the worst is yet to come as Leon has Zigfried's mysterious and special card.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Golden Castle of Stromberg is infecting the world's Duel Disks with a virus that will destroy KaibaCorp. If Yugi doesn't destroy the card, the virus program can't be stopped.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang goes on an exotic trip to India, but when their plane crashes in a deserted forest, their vacation turns into a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Realizing that they've become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice. But their celebration is soon interrupted by a pack of man-eating wolves, a giant turtle, and an angry Genie!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: After fighting with her mom, Sam moves in with Carly, who soon realizes she's a horrible guest. Freddie is stalked by a dangerous criminal after catching him on video committing a crime.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When a video of Nevel yelling at a little girl surfaces on the internet, Nevel becomes hated by everyone. After celebrating Nevel's demise, the iCarly gang then works to restore his honor after Nevel begs them for help.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: The gang decides to hire an intern for the web series. Carly and Sam hire a guy they think is cute, but the new intern proves to be more trouble than he's worth. Freddy has to prove to Carly and Sam that they're better off without him.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: The gang spends the night finishing their projects at Ridgeway during the annual school lock-in. Carly and Freddie start to suspect that Sam might have a crush on their new friend Brad.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Carly suspects that her new boyfriend, Steven, is cheating on her with Tori Vega, so the gang plans a trip to Los Angeles to catch him in the act at a party thrown by Andre at Kenan Thompson's house.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Cat feels left out by Jade and Sam, so she befriends an old friend of Sam's; this competition for affection ends up getting out of hand.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Sam tries to get revenge on Cat by befriending Robbie; Dice wins a tank of man-eating tuna fish in a poker game.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat begin to notice that their friends are obsessed with a new phone game; the audience is distracted at Cat's one woman show.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat start making their own version of their favorite soda after it is banned.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Jennette McCurdy, Ariana Grande, Cameron Ocasio, Maree Cheatham and Zoran Korach are on a lunch break from filming “Sam & Cat”; the cast is interrupted by fans of the show.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat promise to buy a doll for a girl if she raises her grades; Sam and Cat are financially strained; Goomer loses his lucky shirt.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: The gang must rescue Cat when she is trapped inside of one of Dice's magic tricks.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat encounter problems when they try a new drone delivery service online.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat are hired to accompany two obnoxious children on a flight to the Bahamas.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Nora targets Dice as a way to get revenge on Sam; Sam and Cat are forced to ask Nevel for help.

programme.title: Victorious: The Birthweek Song
programme.desc: Tori struggles to find the perfect birthday gift for Trina, then decides to write her sister a song as a present. An ungrateful Trina turns the song into cash by selling it, enraging Tori.

programme.title: Victorious: Robarazzi
programme.desc: Tori suggests Robbie capture videos of students' everyday lives to increase his blog traffic, but when the camera is turned on Tori, she asks him to stop. Only Robbie doesn't and Tori realizes she's created a monster.

programme.title: Victorious: A Film by Dale Squires
programme.desc: When a hot young filmmaker comes to Hollywood Arts, the kids are excited to work on his project. But when the film is released, and they aren't given credit, the kids turn to revenge.

programme.title: Victorious: Rex Dies
programme.desc: As the kids prepare for a big play, Rex is accidentally sucked into a giant fan and Tori is responsible. Robbie is an emotional wreck, and it's up to Tori to save the day by saving Rex's life.

programme.title: Victorious: The Diddly-Bops
programme.desc: Sikowitz recruits the gang to form a children's band for a friend's party. When a leaked video of the group's performance becomes popular, Andre struggles to be taken seriously as a musician.

programme.title: Victorious: Cat's New Boyfriend
programme.desc: Cat begins dating Tori's ex-boyfriend, Danny (Matt Angel) and Tori becomes jealous. Meanwhile, Trina convinces Robbie, Andre, Jade and Beck to indulge their feet in callus-eating fish that she's been buying from some stranger.

programme.title: Victorious: Sleepover at Sikowitz's
programme.desc: Sikowitz invites the gang to have a sleepover at his house in order to teach them a lesson in method acting.

programme.title: Victorious: The Wood
programme.desc: The kids are excited to hear that they'll be the stars of a new reality show being filmed at Hollywood Arts. Meanwhile, Trina and Robbie are forced to work at The Grub Truck after injuring Festus.

programme.title: Victorious: The Great Ping-Pong Scam
programme.desc: Tori discovers that her friends have been secretly going to a fancy restaurant instead of playing in an annual ping pong tournament.

programme.title: Victorious: Wok Star
programme.desc: Tori agrees to help Jade find a theater to perform a play Jade wrote. But when the sponsor demands changes that will ruin Jade's play, Tori has to make things right before opening night.

programme.title: Victorious: Survival of the Hottest
programme.desc: A heat wave hits LA and the gang heads for the beach in Beck's RV. But once there, they find themselves trapped inside the RV as the temperature rises. Oblivious, Cat parties it up with some cute boys.

programme.title: Victorious: Wi-Fi in the Sky
programme.desc: Tori's flight home is delayed, leaving her no time to finish a school project with her friends. She attempts to get the work done with them over video chat, but things keep getting in the way.
